protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: The muscarinic acetylcholine receptor mediates various cellular responses, including inhibition of adenylate cyclase, breakdown of phosphoinositides and modulation of potassium channels through the action of G proteins. Primary transducing effect is Pi turnover

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
